query:
SELECT 
  s.id,
  s.name,
  GROUP_CONCAT(CONCAT(a.id, ':', a.name, ':', p.ourPrice) ORDER BY a.id SEPARATOR ' | ') as apis
FROM prices p
INNER JOIN services s ON p.serviceId = s.id
INNER JOIN sms_apis a ON p.apiId = a.id
INNER JOIN countries c ON p.countryId = c.id
WHERE c.code = 'brazil'
  AND a.active = 1
GROUP BY s.id, s.name
HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT p.apiId) > 1
LIMIT 5;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 35dchGD4KrPJFby.root --database 2KeMNLvGvAyUJv9AEWkrsw --execute SELECT 
  s.id,
  s.name,
  GROUP_CONCAT(CONCAT(a.id, ':', a.name, ':', p.ourPrice) ORDER BY a.id SEPARATOR ' | ') as apis
FROM prices p
INNER JOIN services s ON p.serviceId = s.id
INNER JOIN sms_apis a ON p.apiId = a.id
INNER JOIN countries c ON p.countryId = c.id
WHERE c.code = 'brazil'
  AND a.active = 1
GROUP BY s.id, s.name
HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT p.apiId) > 1
LIMIT 5;
